column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Sokka says : " Ooh !
#Text=That 's an original from Piandao , the greatest swordsmaster and sword maker in Fire Nation history .
#Text=He lives in the big castle up the road from here .
#Text=" Aang says : " That 's it !
#Text=That 's what you needed all along , Sokka .
#Text=" Sokka says : " A sword ?
#Text=" Aang says : " Not the sword , a master .
#Text=We 've all had masters to help us get better .
#Text=You should see if you can study with Piandao .
#Text=" Katara says : " That 's a great idea .
#Text=I could 've never gotten to where I am without Master Pakku .
#Text=Everyone needs a teacher .
#Text=" Toph says : " I learned from badgermoles .
#Text=They do n't talk , but they 're still good teachers .
#Text=" Sokka says : " It would be nice to be a master sword fighter .
#Text=All right , I 'll talk to him .
#Text="
